pages.text: $(o)"In the Throne Room, the Dancer dances inside the Mirror who reflects the King. In the Throne Room, the Dancer steps inside the soul. Inside the soul, the Dancer acts on every whim, and every influence, and with the Dancer we feel, because her tale of emotion is the only tale of emotion we will ever listen to."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(l:shaping/entry_mirror)Mirror of the Soul$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Soul$() aspect. Additionally, it will also pick up influences, which will act as souls for the altar the symbol is linked to.
